HomeWiki:
Project Description
A DotNetNuke Design Challenge skin package submitted to the "Personal" category by Atul Handa and Kevin McCusker of Mercer. This skin is a generic personal skin package with five available themes one for each season of the year, and a default theme. Uses Core Navigation Provider.

The initial release of this HTML skin & container package requires DotNetNuke Core (Community or Pro) version 5.2.0 or greater.

A live demo can be seen @: http://skins.dotnetnuke.com/seasons
Originally contributed by: Atul Handa and Kevin McCusker
